short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate your productivity with CopyIn2Clicks. Effortlessly copy and manage text from any website with advanced features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CopyIn2Clicks, the most extensive copying tool on chrome. Copy and save any text in just a mere two clicks.

Includes advanced features such as saving copied items, downloading saved text, copying format of text, regular copy storage, and many more!
